Text.val: **eventIsn is not mandatory, if empty we save relationship directly to lat/long i.e to entity, for coupons, admission etc**
**reverse geo to get location/address, this will need to be entity at some point**
**we create template and app config for the first ticket created by the entity/location**
**we need to check for existence of entity_location/passtemplate relationship**

ExpSyntax.val: 'Tickets can be attributed to an event id OR a geography'
